solution_line_template: Eric's trip to the park took {running_time} minutes running + {jogging_time} minutes jogging = <<{running_time}+{jogging_time}={time_to_park}>>{time_to_park} minutes.
So his return trip took {time_to_park} minutes * {multiplier_return_trip} = <<{time_to_park}*{multiplier_return_trip}={return_trip_time}>>{return_trip_time} minutes.
